name: Bomb Hunter MT
summary:
"Bomb Hunter MT 2.0" is a hunting game about humans and dinosaurs. It is played on an island with an area of 4 
square kilometers. Players need to use their skills to deal with these dinosaurs. You can play against them. Hunt 
them and you can kill them one by one with guerrilla warfare. Once the battle begins, no one place is safe, 
because they will soon catch up with you and the game experience will be strained! stimulate! readily!
